title: Vitol Part of Consortium for South Africa LNG-to-Power Project
description: Vitol Group is part of a consortium proposing a gas-to-power project in South Africa, as the country looks to replace aging coal stations.
content: Vitol Group is part of a consortium proposing a gas-to-power project in South Africa, as the country looks to replace aging coal stations.
